Pre-Game Insights: The game was canceled due to rain, preventing José Ramírez from a shot at hitting his 40th home run and joining the exclusive 40-40 club.
Post-Match Reflections: Stephen Vogt said that José Ramírez's season was still a 'pretty cool feat' despite not reaching the 40-40 club.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The rain delay lasted for 3 hours and 5 minutes, and the game was ultimately called due to safety concerns for the players.
Others: The Guardians finished the season with a 92-69 record and will host Game 1 of the ALDS on Oct. 5.
The Astros will host Game 1 of the AL wild-card series at home on Tuesday.
